decks.notes: The deck focuses on creating a fast-paced aggressive strategy by utilizing creatures with haste and powerful abilities to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes cards that provide additional value through card advantage and disruption, while also incorporating a mana ramping element to accelerate the game plan. By combining efficient threats with disruptive elements, the deck aims to establish early board control and deal damage to the opponent before they can stabilize. Additionally, the inclusion of the companion card Jegantha, the Wellspring provides additional synergy and flexibility to the overall game plan.

The deck focuses on cycling through cards and controlling the board until the player is able to cast Living End, which will return all creatures from the graveyard to the battlefield and hopefully overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence. The deck includes various cycling creatures and spells to enable this combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also utilizing cards like Subtlety and Endurance to protect its strategy. It aims to win through a decisive swing in board advantage after casting Living End.

The main concept of this Aggro - Affinity deck is to quickly and efficiently drop cheap artifacts onto the battlefield, then use cards like Cranial Plating and Shadowspear to boost their power and attack aggressively. Emry, Lurker of the Loch provides additional synergy with artifacts, while cards like Metallic Rebuke offer disruption to control opponent's game plan. Urza's Saga adds valuable card advantage and searching capabilities. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast, evasive creatures and powerful equipment to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on using Eldrazi creatures and powerful ramp spells to control the game and overwhelm the opponent with big threats. The deck aims to use cards like Ancient Stirrings and Eldrazi Temple to bring out massive creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker quickly. With spells like Kozilek's Command and Ugin's Labyrinth for removal, and cards like Malevolent Rumble and Sowing Mycospawn for extra control, the deck is designed to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building up its own powerful board presence.

This deck focuses on mana acceleration through ramp spells like Utopia Sprawl and Talismans to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. Control elements are utilized in the form of board wipes like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Return, along with disruption spells such as Kozilek's Command. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with giant threats while controlling the board and disrupting their game plan, ultimately leading to victory by overpowering them with Eldrazi creatures.

The deck focuses on establishing a formidable mana base with UrzaTron lands and Eldrazi Temples to quickly ramp into powerful threats like Ulamog and Karn. It utilizes control elements such as All Is Dust, Chalice of the Void, and Thought-Knot Seer to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also generating card advantage with cards like Sowing Mycospawn and Ugin's Labyrinth. The deck's win condition revolves around overwhelming the opponent with large Eldrazi creatures and locking down the board with powerful artifacts like Karn, the Great Creator.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill up your graveyard with cards like Goblin Lore, Burning Inquiry, and Mishra's Bauble to enable cards like Hollow One and Dragon's Rage Channeler. Utilizing the graveyard as a resource, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Detective's Phoenix, Nethergoyf, and Orcish Bowmasters. Fear of Missing Out and Arena of Glory help to maintain pressure on the opponent, while Lightning Bolt and Tarfire provide direct damage to close out the game. This deck focuses on speed and aggression to quickly defeat the opponent.

The Ruby Storm deck focuses on quickly generating mana through spells like Desperate Ritual and Pyretic Ritual, then casting powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage or Questing Druid to create a chain reaction of spells and overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Reckless Impulse and Wish for additional card advantage and flexibility. By efficiently using mana acceleration and card draw, the deck aims to assemble key pieces like Past in Flames and Glimpse the Impossible to potentially win the game in a single explosive turn.

The main objective of this deck is to consistently combo off without relying on lands. By using cards like Thundertrap Trainer, Waterlogged Teachings, and Rush of Inspiration, the player can generate a strong board presence and overwhelm their opponent. Protection is provided through cards like Pact of Negation and Flare of Denial, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student offers card advantage. With a mix of control and combo pieces, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and efficiently to win the game before the opponent can react.
